fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may purchase up to 7 Maids for the Castle for $50 each, rather than houses. This does not increase rent, but whenever you yourself land at the Castle, you earn $100 per Maid.
- This Castle is costly to maintain. Every time you pass go, subtract $5 from your total earnings for every Maid you do not yet have (so starting at -$35).
